summary:
A player house overlooking the plains west of Whiterun. It has lots of storage space, including display cases, weapon plaques etc.
 
Heimdall Features:
 
convenient location near Whiterun.
 
all crafting equipment within easy reach and, if you prefer, all crafting can be done outside. 

a swimming pool where you can take a healing bath
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=orange]
CHECK OUT THE \"New Heimdall\" MOD INSTEAD: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29786]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29786[/url]
[/color][/heading]
A player house overlooking the plains west of Whiterun. It has lots of storage space, including display cases, weapon plaques etc.
 
Heimdall Features:
-----------------------
-----------------------
 
convenient location near Whiterun.
 
all crafting equipment within easy reach and, if you prefer, all crafting can be done outside. 

a swimming pool where you can take a healing bath


reviews
--------
--------

\"WOW!!! This is way better than I expected! I can hardly believe you don\'t have more comments here! The clutter is moderate and organized, the lighting is perfect, it\'s companion friendly and it just looks absolutely beautiful!\"

          midiaura, comments section


\"...a house that isn\'t too cluttered, isn\'t too huge...it\'s nice and simple, but has everything you could really need  in there....I generally just enjoy this house...\"

        http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UK0gW_tGDNI&feature=g-u-u 
       (parental guidance is advised)
 

\"Good home for a \"real\" thane of whiterun.\"

        [CZ]Eclipse{ATG}, skyrim workshop


\"VERY nice. Smooth, sleek, and well lit.\"

       Mercury, skyrim workshop


\"Looks lovely the new pool. Simple and Refreshing. Nothing much in the way of getting done what you need to get done.\"

        Masticina Akicta, skyrim workshop


(skyrim workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=89752418&searchtext=)

 

Crafting:
- ----------
------------
 Alchemy Lab (2)
 Arcane Enchanter (2)
 Smelter
 Forge
 Grindstone
 Workbench
 Tanning Rack
 
Storage:
-----------
-----------
 18 bookshelves
 12 display cases
 13 weapon plaques
 6 mannequins
 8 (x2) weapon racks
 45 storage spaces
 

Installation
 -------------
 -------------
 
I strongly recommend that you also use to the following mods:
 
\"Water FX - Get Wet\"
 
\"Pure Waters\"
 
 
Known Issues
 -----------------
 -----------------
 
I can be a bit hard to reach the weapons on the weapon plaques in the first room in the basement.
 If you\'re having trouble, stand on the table and look left (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yltaZM4E2fY&feature=youtu.be). This is a minor issue only affecting 3 of 13 weapon plaques.
author: newheimdall
